tool_description: Cricket Times - Cricket News API: Your Gateway to Real-Time Cricket Updates!
name: Cricket News API
title: Cricket News API

api_list.name: List Posts
api_list.description: Query this endpoint to retrieve a collection of posts. The response you receive can be controlled and filtered using the URL query parameters below.

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description:
Limit result set to items with specific terms assigned in the categories taxonomy.

Below are supported category Ids:

- Featured News: 1001
- Fantasy Predictions: 6930
- Indian Premier League (IPL): 6
- Women Cricket: 5337
- Big Bash League: 5704
- SA20: 8471
- Super Smash League: 12054
- Pakistan Super League (PSL): 11489
- Bangladesh Premier League (BPL): 12560
- International League T20 (ILT20): 8466
- T20I: 1223
- ODI: 2070
- Test: 2071

*Your desired category not in the above list? No worries, please reach to us.*

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description:
Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.
eg: 2024-02-28 18:00:00.000

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description:
Limit results to those matching a string.
eg: Virat+Kohli

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.
Default: 10

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description:
Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.
eg: 2024-02-29 18:00:00.000

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
Order sort attribute ascending or descending.
Default: desc

One of: asc, desc

optional_parameters.name: orderby
optional_parameters.description:
Sort collection by post attribute.
Default: date

One of: date, id, title

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Current page of the collection.
Default: 1

api_list.name: Get Post
api_list.description:
Query this endpoint to retrieve a specific post record.

Response contains the following:
- id: *Unique identifier for the post.  (JSON data type: integer).*
- date: *The date the post was published in GMT. (JSON data type: string).*
- title: *The title for the post. (JSON data type: object).*
- link: *URL to the post. (JSON data type: string).*
- fimg_url: *URL of the featured media for the post. (JSON data type: string).*
- excerpt: *The excerpt for the post. (JSON data type: object).*
- content: *The content for the post. (JSON data type: object).*
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com/posts/123768"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com/posts/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-news-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
